heading: most wanted
subheading: there might be a certain caché involved, but it's not generally a list you want to make. but terrorist osama bin laden and accused abortion-doctor killer james kopp have been added to the fbi's ten most wanted list. the g-men would like to apprehend bin laden for the bombings of us embassies in kenya and tanzania last year. as for kopp, he's wanted in the slaying of dr. barnett slepian, shot dead by a sniper last august as he stood in his kitchen.
author: wired staff
text: there might be a certain caché involved, but it's not generally a list you want to make. but terrorist osama bin laden and accused abortion-doctor killer james kopp have been added to the fbi's ten most wanted list. the g-men would like to apprehend bin laden for the bombings of us embassies in kenya and tanzania last year. as for kopp, he's wanted in the slaying of dr. barnett slepian, shot dead by a sniper last august as he stood in his kitchen.
